thread.title: Man rescued after fall from roof in Broxburn
thread.title_full: Man rescued after fall from roof in Broxburn

title: Man rescued after fall from roof in Broxburn
text:
Man rescued after fall from roof in Broxburn 4 February 2017 Image copyright Google Image caption The man fell from a roof in Greendykes Road in Broxburn A man who fell from a roof in West Lothian and became trapped is being treated for spinal injuries. 
Fire crews said the man fell about 20ft from the roof of the building in Broxburn's Greendykes Road and got stuck at about 03:30. 
They were eventually able to reach him through a shop on the ground floor and brought him out on a stretcher. 
The man has been taken to Edinburgh Royal Infirmary with a suspected back injury.
